ComicInfo.Summary: A masked hero and his Native sidekick Toronto are surrounded by a band of Natives, whereupon Toronto switches allegiances.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:18:56. [CVDB166064] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:43:54. [Issue ID 250721]
